name: Superficial Damage (V)
Lore: 'Veteran Rebel engineers know that weapon systems positioned for adequate coverage are vulnerable themselves.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. You may forfeit non-lightsaber weapons (using forfeit value = 3); place your just forfeited weapon in Used Pile. During your deploy phase, if you just deployed a vehicle or starship, may deploy a weapon (for free) on that vehicle or starship from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
